import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Bell, Settings, User, Home as HomeIcon } from 'lucide-react'; import './PlantillaBase.css'; import 'bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.css'; const PlantillaBase = () => { const [elements, setElements] = useState([ { id: 1, title: 'Elemento 1', description: 'Descripci贸n del elemento 1' }, { id: 2, title: 'Elemento 2', description: 'Descripci贸n del elemento 2' }, { id: 3, title: 'Elemento 3', description: 'Descripci贸n del elemento 3' }, ]); const addElement = () => { const newId = elements.length ? elements[elements.length - 1].id + 1 : 1; const newElement = { id: newId, title: `Elemento ${newId}`, description: `Descripci贸n del elemento ${newId}` }; setElements([...elements, newElement]); }; const removeElement = (id) => { setElements(elements.filter(element => element.id !== id)); }; const fechaActual = new Date().toLocaleDateString('es-ES', { day: '2-digit', month: 'long', year: 'numeric', }); return (
ETgc

{fechaActual}

Elementos de la Escaleta

{elements.map(element => (

{element.title}

{element.description}

))}

漏 2024 Torneos SAS | Colombia

Pol铆ticas T茅rminos de servicio Contacto
); }; export default PlantillaBase;
